title: Tiffin/Monthly Meal service near PES (RR)
content: Asking this once again since nobody gave any answer last time ðŸ¥², Please let me know if you have any leads for Monthly tiffin service near Pes rr campus, this is for people who are living in flats near campus.

comments.body: Let me know (commenting here for better reach)
How much are you willing to spend per meal??
2 time meal i.e Lunch and dinner and monthly around 5 or 6 max

Hmm,Itâ€™s really tough to find an established meal service in the range of 80-100 per meal,I would recommend asking around in your apartment group chat,more often than not thereâ€™s always a sweet aunty that would make food and put it into a dabba that you give her but I donâ€™t think itâ€™ll fit your budget.Your best and safest bet is probably learning to cook and meal prep,the best for your health and peace of mind.
Brahmashree Tiffin center is good and excellent
you can just opt for the hostel mess (i have a friend who lives in a flat but eats food in the mess) , i reckon its 5k per month , just enquire there once
Letâ€™s see, this is definitely the last option
How much for a month and do they deliver to home or we need to pickup ourself?
That I am not sure, enquire there once
